extendedInfo.description: The Markets on Mobile app is your gateway to all critical real-time information about the Indian and global markets through your Android device. If you are an investor, trader, professional or just interested in business, economy and financial markets, you will find this to be an invaluable tool. And this application is powered by moneycontrol.com â Indiaâs no.1 financial and business portal trusted by millions.Use the application to get real time stock quotes, Indian and Global market Indices, manage and keep track of your investment portfolio, watch Live TV and get in-depth coverage & analysis of financial markets, economy and business.The application is now available to you on your Android mobile. For any queries regarding the app, mail us on feedback@moneycontrol.comDownload the app to get going. Itâs fast, easy-to-use and FREE.

reviews.title: Very much user friendly. Awsom
reviews.comment: If you r a investor or just a student and having interest in capital matket , you r incomplete widout this app.
reviews.author: Swami Jee

reviews.comment: Its an excellent app for new users who likes to track market on real time basis. Especially, when you are away from your laptop or pc, while travelling. This works really well.
reviews.author: Hardik Shah

reviews.title: good till last version
reviews.comment: in latest version I go my wachlist choose any script go deep in it  and when I come out that script and come to my watch list I have to see it from 1 st script. it really borring.
reviews.author: drnimesh patel

reviews.title: Perfect place for a perfect beginner
reviews.comment: Awesome app,  almost like doing in pc. Super exp with portfolio and watchlist features, but live prices N/A although a five star app.
reviews.author: Ravi Teja Mandapati

reviews.title: Improved performance
reviews.comment: Really the performance has been improved.  Now works smoothly. Video quality is now vry gr8 keep it up.
reviews.author: Numan Suriya

reviews.title: V good app but no f&o
reviews.comment: Have very good experience n one of tge Best if tracking only equality. Pls update to include f&o too
reviews.author: Jigar Shah

reviews.title: Bugs as Iam using Samsung galaxy grand
reviews.comment: Correct the scrolling in the app. As it\'s not up to the mark. Otherwise it\'s nice app.
reviews.author: Pratik Sanghavi

reviews.title: pls provide audio
reviews.comment: 3g is nt afordable for everybody so if u give audio commentry tat will b very helpful
reviews.author: nachiket parvatikar

reviews.title: Improvements needed
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t show the details of fixed income or bullion income.   In the news section,  limited news is available. All the news on the website should be available.   I will make it five star as soon as these features are added.   Regards
reviews.author: Ankit Agarwal

reviews.title: 7 stars...
reviews.comment: If you trade stocks or have mutual funds etc.. then an awesome app to have. Register and add your stocks and anytime you want to know your portfolio... it\'s there updated. Must have.
reviews.author: Nab Z

reviews.title: Good but dissapears
reviews.comment: Money control just dissapears on my galaxy note, and I have to Reinstall it again and again. Though the settings remain. Some conflict I guess.
reviews.author: Anand Hukmani

reviews.title: Only Best Stock Market App
reviews.comment: The best app to keep a track of the stock market!!!  commodities and every thing for stock market!!
reviews.author: Ashish Bajaj

reviews.title: Need update
reviews.comment: It always have cache when it is started... so please solve this then only I will give 5 stars
reviews.author: raj dattani

reviews.title: Best software for bse stock
reviews.comment: Pls make software to auto refresh portfolio and add sensex & nifty in portfolio
reviews.author: Arun Badala

reviews.title: Gr8
reviews.comment: Gr8 app for market. Would like to see a widget for my portfolio.
reviews.author: bobby dua

reviews.title: Curreny index not working
reviews.comment: My currency index is not working. Stuck at one place. Pls fix asap.
reviews.author: Veer Singh

reviews.title: Good App to be with
reviews.comment: Good for beginners but lacks stock analysis tools, I will still prefer My stock genie stock market app which has precise Stock analysis tools like stock color coding, Mrp etc.
reviews.author: Abhijeet Kotwal

reviews.comment: Excellent app.. everything just a click away
reviews.author: anshul goel

reviews.title: Very Good App
reviews.comment: Its excellent app to track market but F&O data missing.
reviews.author: kirti nagda

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Without this app in financial market android phone are useless. ..
